name: Raimodula
description:
The central core has been taken and it's up to you to restore control!


Choose between two distinct characters, customize them and face an army of modular enemies in a randomly chosen path! A very dynamic arcade experience!

Unlock chips and find upgrades for more customization options on the next playtrough!

Quickly dispatch enemies and bosses with weapon combos!

For dedicated players: pursue high area ranks on standard modes and fast times on Speedrun mode, with fixed sequence and a timer!

Can you reach 100%?

Features:


  • 115 areas, randomly selected and arranged;
  • 23 chips to evolve and arm your character;
  • 7 stages;
  • 4 difficulty levels;
  • 2 simultaneous players;
  • 1 life. Good luck!
